title: Where are you in the information totem pole? | Manas J. Saloi

content: Where are you in the information totem pole? | Manas J. Saloi I was listening to this podcast hosted by Cobie and then Light Crypto went on a rant that blew my mind. ‚ÄúI feel like i want to give a warning to people here about like when you when you trade short term versus long term like you want to know where you are in the informational totem pole, like everyone knows that picture of like birds sitting on like the electricity wires and they‚Äôre all shitting on each other. So like a couple of days ago, one of my friends was like, yo, man, you gotta go long on this project because the mainnet is tomorrow. And you have to understand that like, what what information is in the Claude Shannon perspective, right? Information is surprise. So there‚Äôs a bunch of people who think that they‚Äôll hear something and they won‚Äôt consider like when in the like human centipede process of information-sharing. They are because they‚Äôll be towards the end right? And like that‚Äôs in a money game. That‚Äôs the person who gets left holding the bag and so I would I would give a word of caution to people who are chasing trends to understand that you need to know whether you‚Äôre the fool or whether you‚Äôre the one who‚Äôs getting the information fairly early on before it propagates through the system. It‚Äôs really important because if you don‚Äôt know who the marginal buyer is, then you are the marginal buyer and you are the person that gets stuck.‚Äù Are you the fish on the table?
html:
Manas J. Saloi
BlogBookshelfSummariesLinksPOWUses This

Where are you in the information totem pole?

Feb 4, 2022

I was listening to this podcast hosted by Cobie and then Light Crypto went on a rant that blew my mind.

‚ÄúI feel like i want to give a warning to people here about like when you when you trade short term versus long term like ¬†you want to know where you are in the informational totem pole, like everyone knows that picture of like birds sitting on like the electricity wires and they‚Äôre all shitting on each other. So like a couple of days ago, one of my friends was like, yo, man, you gotta go long on this project because the mainnet is tomorrow. And you have to understand that like, what what information is in the Claude Shannon perspective, right? Information is surprise. So there‚Äôs a bunch of people who think that they‚Äôll hear something and they won‚Äôt consider like when in the like human centipede process of information-sharing. They are because they‚Äôll be towards the end right? And like that‚Äôs in a money game. That‚Äôs the person who gets left holding the bag and so I would I would give a word of caution to people who are chasing trends to understand that you need to know whether you‚Äôre the fool or whether you‚Äôre the one who‚Äôs getting the information fairly early on before it ¬†propagates through the system. It‚Äôs really important because if you don‚Äôt know who the marginal buyer is, then you are the marginal buyer and you are the person that gets stuck.‚Äù

Are you the fish on the table?
